text: Having a daily Sadhana has totally changed my life. I am in love with my sacred morning practice.
author: Maria

text: I have gone from working 7 days a week all year around to working 3-4 days a week. And I am focusing on my own needs.
author: Anna

text: Nothing happens and then suddenly everything changes. And now I am all into starting my day with a morning practice!
author: Joanna
